attributes.action: Stop the 10pm curfew for the hospitality sector
attributes.additional_details: Us publicans are struggling with all the new laws and restrictions all ready the 10pm curfew is putting a massive strain on us all a lot us are going to put us out off business they will be no pubs left this rate
attributes.background: I would like the government to cancel the 10pm curfew for bars and restaurants so business can operate as normal as possible
